abstract: After the literary agent Andrew Wylie started his own publishing venture, Random House cut ties to his agency.
snippet: After the literary agent Andrew Wylie started his own publishing venture, Random House cut ties to his agency.
lead_paragraph: The literary agent Andrew Wylie announced on Wednesday that he had started his own publishing venture and would produce e-book editions available exclusively on Amazon.com for 20 titles, including those by Philip Roth and Vladimir Nabokov.

headline.main: Amazon E-Book Venture Stirs Fuss in Publishing
headline.print_headline: Wylie’s Amazon-Only E-Book Venture Stirs a Fuss in Publishing
